answer: तुमी ०९/०७ दिसां सांगलें की 'परिस्थिती वायट जावंक शकता'. ०९/०८ दिसां सीटी स्कॅनांत 'निमोनिया वांगडा कमी वजनाच्या फुफ्फुसांचो एम्बोलिझम (5%) ' दिसलो. फुफ्फुसांच्या फोडां वांगडा व्हडा प्रमाणांत वखदांच्या प्रतिरोधी बॅक्टेरिया मेळ्ळे.

discharge_summary: admission: 09/01/2020, discharge: 09/17/2020, stay: 16 d 13 h, location: ward, payer: SUS. A 67-year-old patient with a history of overweight, smoking, and major depression was admitted on 09/01 with a perforative acute abdomen, diagnosed after examinations. On the evening of 08/31, she sought care with abdominal pain, general malaise, and dyspnea. She had undergone hysterectomy on 08/30. On 09/01, she underwent exploratory laparotomy with a finding of intestinal perforation, with a suture of the lesion and placement of a peritoneostomy. She developed severe circulatory shock, probably due to peritonitis from contamination of the abdominal cavity, and antibiotic treatment was promptly started. She was re-addressed on 09/06, where an appendectomy and abdominal wall closure were performed. On 09/07, the patient's ventilatory status began to worsen, and a chest tomography scan was performed on 09/08, revealing low-load pulmonary embolism (5%) in addition to pneumonia. A multiresistant germ was isolated in a lung culture, with specific treatment directed at the patient. Given the clinical progression, a tracheostomy was indicated due to the need for prolonged mechanical ventilation. On 09/15, {omitted} prolonged cardiopulmonary arrest was reversed after approximately 20 minutes. The patient follow-up appointmented to the intensive care unit after the procedure, with mydriatic pupils and absence of reflexes. On 09/17, a computed tomography scan of the skull was performed, revealing anoxic-ischemic encephalopathy. Tests were performed to confirm brain death, which was confirmed on {omitted}. Perforating acute abdomen. 09/01: computed tomography of the abdomen and pelvis: pneumoperitoneum, ascites, signs of peritonitis, parietal hyperalces and edema of the loops 09/01: computed tomography of the chest, pulmonary congestion, cardiomegaly, bilateral pleural effusion, opacities suggestive of an inflammatory or infectious process 09/08: computed tomography of the chest, pulmonary thromboembolism with 5% embolic burden 09/17: computed tomography of the skull. 09/01: exploratory laparotomy, sigmoid suture, creation of peritoneostomy 09/06: review, touch-ups on previous surgery with appendectomy and closure of the abdominal wall 09/15: tracheostomy 09/15: bilateral chest drainage. death.
question: श्वास नळीचें (श्वासनलिका) ऑपरेशन कित्याक गरजेचें?
answer: दीर्घकाळाच्या यांत्रीक वायुवीजनाची गरज आशिल्ल्यान, ट्रॅकिओस्टोमीची सुचोवणी केली.

question: हो खोंकली फकत 15 सप्टेंबरक संसर्गजन्य आशिल्लो काय?
answer: 15 नोव्हेंबराक, तुका 'हल्ल्याक लांब काळा मेरेन सामनो करचें पडलें आनी स्वास कोंडलो' (ताका काळजाचो आताक आयलो) 'सुमार 20 मिण्टां परत मेळ्ळीं'.

question: हॉस्पिटलांत भितर वचप हें म्हजें निमाणें काम आशिल्लें काय?
answer: अधिकृत अहवालांत, "कसलोय घातकी खेळ जाला काय ना तें थारावपा खातीर शवचिकित्सा केली, जाची 'शवचिकित्सा अहवाला'न पुश्टी केली" अशें सांगलां.

discharge_summary: 1 severe acute respiratory syndrome, due to coronavirus. 2 new septic shock 01/14, fever hypotension, 3 acneiform eruption secondary to corticosteroid therapy, 4 pneumomediastinum airway injury? subcutaneous emphysema after depronation worsening ventilatory status, 5 new septic shock on 01/24 start of vasoactive drug, leukocytosis, 6 reactive adrenal insufficiency? hyperkalemia hyponatremia shock. admission: 01/06/2020, discharge: 03/03/2020, stay: 01 m 24 d 18 h, location: ward, payer: sus. clinical history [person] reports that he started with headache, myalgia and dry cough on 12/28, persisting with the same until 12/31, when he sought care and was prescribed prednisone, azithromycin, zinc and symptomatics. [person] started taking prescribed medications and on 02/01 he started with a fever, having performed a PCR for coronavirus with no result yet. On 03/01 he presented respiratory discomfort, having sought care on 04/01, when antibiotic therapy was changed to intravenous; the family member does not know which medication, however, there was no indication for hospital admission. [person] persisted with respiratory discomfort, having been hospitalized in the early hours of the same day. Emergency care unit report of oxygen saturation of 88% on room air, progressively worsening. He was admitted to the emergency unit on 06/01 with severe pulmonary involvement on chest x-ray, and was continued on antibiotic therapy initiated in the emergency care unit, ceftriaxone daily on 05/01 and prophylactic dexamethasone and enoxaparin initiated. He was admitted to [organization] on 07/01, requiring orotracheal intubation and central venous catheterization. He presented septic shock on 14/01, and his antibiotic regimen was changed. He remained in bed at [organization]. He developed new septic shock on 24/01, and began using fluconazole for fungal coverage. He developed pneumomediastinum on 26/01 due to airway injury, and underwent conservative treatment. He underwent tracheostomy on 29/01. He presented reactive adrenal insufficiency and acneiform rash related to corticosteroid therapy, in addition to diarrhea treated empirically with the hypothesis of pseudomembranous colitis. Acinetobacter baumanii was isolated in the tracheal aspirate, but was not treated due to the lack of clinical repercussion. He presented progressive clinical improvement and was transferred to [organization], where he remained stable. He underwent fibroscopy and was evaluated by speech therapy on 02/03, with no residual airway injury identified and a soft diet was released. He was decannulated on 03/03, remaining eupneic and in condition to be discharged. Good general condition, alert, acyanotic, anicteric, afebrile, Glasgow 15, oxygen saturation 94% in room air with capped tracheostomy, respiratory rate 28 inspirations per minute, muscle strength grade 4 in upper and lower limbs, regular heart rhythm in two beats, normal sound sounds without murmurs. Heart rate 76, vesicular breath sounds present, symmetrical, without adventitious sounds, without use of accessory muscles. Flaccid, flat abdomen, painless to palpation, without masses or visceromegaly. Extremities: palpable peripheral pulses, without edema, absence of swelling of the calves. Presence of pressure ulcer in the left lower limb, without signs of infection. Tracheostomy fibroscopy. I advise [person] on outpatient follow-up visits for: head and neck surgery on 03/15 speech therapy on 03/25 reassessment of diet physiatry to be scheduled I advise [person] on home care for tracheostomy orifice, diet, exercise and care. I prescribe symptomatic medications. Aminc, head and neck surgery, speech therapy, physiatry. Good general condition, slim, conscious and oriented, moving all 4 limbs actively with grade 4 muscle strength, still not able to walk alone. Tracheostomy orifice occluded with dressing and eating a soft diet. No pain complaints.
question: कितें, म्हाका आतां हॉस्पिटलांत घालतात काय?
answer: तुमी 'कोरोना वायरस संबंदीत श्वास घेवपाच्या त्रासाक' दाखल जाल्लें. तुमकां 'श्वास घेवपाची समस्या' आशिल्ली आनी 'खोलींतल्या हवेचो ऑक्सिजनची पातळी 88% आशिल्ली, जी हळू हळू इबाडटली.

question: सॅप्टिक शॉक म्हणल्यार कितें? तो म्हणटा तो दोन फावटी येवपाचो आशिल्लो.
answer: तुका 14/01 दिसा सेप्टिक शॉक 'कमी रगतदाब' (low blood pressure) आशिल्लो. तुका 24/01 दिसा नवो सेप्टिक शॉक आयलो, ताका लागून 'सक्रीय वखद' सुरू करचें पडलें.

question: 'Nomadist' ह्या शब्दाचो अर्थ कितें?
answer: 26 जानेवारीक ताका काळजाचो आताक आयलो; ताच्या काळजाच्या झडपांतल्यान गळती जाल्ल्यान स्वास घेवपाक त्रास जालो.

On 03/01 he presented respiratory discomfort, having sought care on 04/01, when antibiotic therapy was changed to intravenous; the family member does not know which medication, however, there was no indication for hospital admission. [person] persisted with respiratory discomfort, having been hospitalized in the early hours of the same day. Emergency care unit report of oxygen saturation of 88% on room air, progressively worsening. He was admitted to the emergency unit on 06/01 with severe pulmonary involvement on chest x-ray, and was continued on antibiotic therapy initiated in the emergency care unit, ceftriaxone daily on 05/01 and prophylactic dexamethasone and enoxaparin initiated. He was admitted to [organization] on 07/01, requiring orotracheal intubation and central venous catheterization. He presented septic shock on 14/01, and his antibiotic regimen was changed. He remained in bed at [organization]. He developed new septic shock on 24/01, and began using fluconazole for fungal coverage. He developed pneumomediastinum on 26/01 due to airway injury, and underwent conservative treatment. He underwent tracheostomy on 29/01. He presented reactive adrenal insufficiency and acneiform rash related to corticosteroid therapy, in addition to diarrhea treated empirically with the hypothesis of pseudomembranous colitis. Acinetobacter baumanii was isolated in the tracheal aspirate, but was not treated due to the lack of clinical repercussion. He presented progressive clinical improvement and was transferred to [organization], where he remained stable. He underwent fibroscopy and was evaluated by speech therapy on 02/03, with no residual airway injury identified and a soft diet was released. He was decannulated on 03/03, remaining eupneic and in condition to be discharged. Good general condition, alert, acyanotic, anicteric, afebrile, Glasgow 15, oxygen saturation 94% in room air with capped tracheostomy, respiratory rate 28 inspirations per minute, muscle strength grade 4 in upper and lower limbs, regular heart rhythm in two beats, normal sound sounds without murmurs. Heart rate 76, vesicular breath sounds present, symmetrical, without adventitious sounds, without use of accessory muscles. Flaccid, flat abdomen, painless to palpation, without masses or visceromegaly. Extremities: palpable peripheral pulses, without edema, absence of swelling of the calves. Presence of pressure ulcer in the left lower limb, without signs of infection. Tracheostomy fibroscopy. I advise [person] on outpatient follow-up visits for: head and neck surgery on 03/15 speech therapy on 03/25 reassessment of diet physiatry to be scheduled I advise [person] on home care for tracheostomy orifice, diet, exercise and care. I prescribe symptomatic medications. Aminc, head and neck surgery, speech therapy, physiatry. Good general condition, slim, conscious and oriented, moving all 4 limbs actively with grade 4 muscle strength, still not able to walk alone. Tracheostomy orifice occluded with dressing and eating a soft diet. No pain complaints.
question: ताणें म्हज्या भुरग्यांच्या आंतकड्यांनी कसलोय संसर्ग पळयलो काय?
answer: लक्षणां नाशिल्ल्या एका दादल्या दुयेंतीक एस्कारिडोसिस जाला अशें निदान जालें पूण ताचेर उपचार केले नात कारण ताका वैजकी नदरेन उणें म्हत्व आशिल्लें अशें मानलें.

question: म्हाका ट्रेकियोस्टोमी केला काय?
answer: तो 'फायब्रोस्कोप' खाला आशिल्लो आनी 'श्वास घेवपाक कसलीच दुखापत जाल्ली ना'. ताका 03/03 दिसा डिकॅन्युलेटेड (ट्यूब काडून उडयल्लो) केलो. डिस्चार्ज दितकच, 'ट्रॅकिओस्टॉमी' ड्रेसिंगान बंद केलो.

question: Can I go in general?
answer: तुजी 02/03 दिसा उलोवपाचे थेरपीची चांचणीच जाल्ली, आनी मोव अन्न सुरू केल्लें. सूट दितना, तुवें मोव अन्न खाल्लें.

question: कितें, म्हजी फाटली स्थिती बरी आसा?
answer: तूं 'ठीक, सामान्य' अवस्थेंत आसा, हुशार. तुका जोर ना, ऑक्सिजन शुद्धताय कुडीच्या तापमानाचेर 94% आसा. ग्लासगो 15, बार. तूं हुशारीन चार हात आनी पांयांचो वापर करून चवथ्या दर्जाच्या स्नायूंच्या बळान चलता, पूण एकलो चलूंक शकना.

question: तुमी भेटूंक वा फुडें वचूंक सोदतात?
answer: तुका भायल्या दुयेंतीच्या उपचारा खातीर प्रवास करचो पडटलो: 03/15 फकत तकली आनी मानेच्या शस्त्रक्रिये खातीर आनी 03/25 फकत स्पीच थेरपी खातीर... तुका फिजिओथेरपी खातीर वेळ थारावचो पडटलो.

discharge_summary: 1. pneumonia, pulmonary metastasis? negative external rt pcr on 06/21 verified by surveillance on 06/23 2. syncope to be clarified neurocardiogenic? investigation suspended 3. consumptive syndrome due to duodenal papilla neoplasia. admission: 06/23/2020, discharge: 06/30/2020, stay: 07 d 05 h, location: ward, payer: sus. history of current illness admission: [person] referred from the emergency care unit, where he was hospitalized for 4 days. reports that 3 days ago he had a sudden episode of loss of consciousness, not preceded by prodromes, with follow-up appointment after a few seconds. level of consciousness without dysfunctions afterwards, without release of sphincters. reports only significant asthenia and fatigue associated. had 2 of these episodes on this day. had already had another similar syncope 20 days ago. He had several episodes of vomiting, which started 5 days ago and improved 2 days ago. His family called [organization] due to his condition. During the evaluation by the transport team, [person] reported an episode of fever (38.3 °C) and dry cough since 06/10. During hospitalization at [organization], he was given antibiotic therapy and referred [person] to our services. His syncope did not recur. He reported diarrhea for 15 days and improvement for 3 days, which is why his chemotherapy cycle was suspended. Upon admission, [person] was hemodynamically stable, breathing with a mask with a reservoir at 10 L/min, without respiratory distress, and denying any complaints at the moment. He is afebrile. Edema of the lower limbs, crackles, and reduced vesicular breath sounds on the left. [person] was pale and emaciated. No relevant results. Pleural fluid puncture and chest drain. Pneumonia, no pending tests. Antibiotic therapy: cefepime and clarithromycin. [person] evolves into death.
question: कितें, म्हाका आतां हॉस्पिटलांत घालतात काय?
answer: तुका 'इमरजेंसी केअर युनिटांत' धाडिल्लो. तुका 3 दीस आदीं 'अचानक कोसळ्ळें' (पडलें), आनी तुका 'खर अशक्तपण आनी दुख' आशिल्लें. तुका 'जोर (38.3 डिग्री सेल्सियस) आनी सुकी खोंकली' लेगीत आशिल्ली.

question: हें 'कनिक्सि सिंड्रोम' आसा काय?
answer: त्या सोबीत बायलेचें वर्णन "धव्या कातीच्या" आनी "चड करून ड्युओडिनल पॅपिलरी नियोप्लाझम (कॅन्सर) सारक्या खाशेल्या खुणां आशिल्ल्या" अशें केल्लें.

question: तुका कळ्ळें हांव कोण? (तो निराश जालो)
answer: सुंदर भाशणांत 'प्रस्न स्पश्ट करपाक सादूरतायेची उणीव' आनी 'तपास थांबोवप' हीं कारणां सांगिल्लीं. तुजे रावपाच्या काळांत तुका 'सादूरतायेची जाणविकाय' नाशिल्ली.

question: म्हाका कोविड-19 जाला काय?
answer: सुंदर निवेदन म्हणटा की तुजो 06/21 दिसा आर.टी.-पी.सी.आर. निकाल न्हयकारात्मक आयिल्लो, जाची तपासणी अधिकाऱ्यान 06/23 दिसा खात्री केली.

discharge_summary: 1. pneumonia, pulmonary metastasis? negative external rt pcr on 06/21 verified by surveillance on 06/23 2. syncope to be clarified neurocardiogenic? investigation suspended 3. consumptive syndrome due to duodenal papilla neoplasia. admission: 06/23/2020, discharge: 06/30/2020, stay: 07 d 05 h, location: ward, payer: sus. history of current illness admission: [person] referred from the emergency care unit, where he was hospitalized for 4 days. reports that 3 days ago he had a sudden episode of loss of consciousness, not preceded by prodromes, with follow-up appointment after a few seconds. level of consciousness without dysfunctions afterwards, without release of sphincters. reports only significant asthenia and fatigue associated. had 2 of these episodes on this day. had already had another similar syncope 20 days ago. He had several episodes of vomiting, which started 5 days ago and improved 2 days ago. His family called [organization] due to his condition. During the evaluation by the transport team, [person] reported an episode of fever (38.3 °C) and dry cough since 06/10. During hospitalization at [organization], he was given antibiotic therapy and referred [person] to our services. His syncope did not recur. He reported diarrhea for 15 days and improvement for 3 days, which is why his chemotherapy cycle was suspended. Upon admission, [person] was hemodynamically stable, breathing with a mask with a reservoir at 10 L/min, without respiratory distress, and denying any complaints at the moment. He is afebrile. Edema of the lower limbs, crackles, and reduced vesicular breath sounds on the left. [person] was pale and emaciated. No relevant results. Pleural fluid puncture and chest drain. Pneumonia, no pending tests. Antibiotic therapy: cefepime and clarithromycin. [person] evolves into death.
question: कितें रे, तुवें म्हाका केमोथेरपी करपाक आडायली?
answer: तुवें म्हटलें की तुका 15 दिसां सावन पिशवी भायर जाता... देखून ताचो कॅमोथेरेपी सायकल रद्द जालो.

question: हांवें स्वास घेवपाक त्रास जाता काय?
answer: During rescue, he was breathing on the reservoir at a rate of 10 liters per minute with a mask on. His examination revealed that there was 'damage to the hard wall and a low vascular respiratory rate'. The brief report stated that 'pneumonia is present'.

question: ताणें म्हज्या काळजांतल्यान सोदून काडलें?
answer: "मरणाचें कारण" "पुल्मनरी एडिमा आनी फिग्दाचें अपेशीपण" आनी "दाव्या व्हँट्रिक्युलर कोलाप्स" अशें नोंद केल्लें अशें सारांश अहवालांत सांगलां.

question: कितें, म्हाका आतां हॉस्पिटलांत घालतात काय?
answer: तुका 'सांगो'क गंभीर स्वास घेवपाच्या त्रासाच्या सिंड्रोमाक लागून भरती केल्लो. 28 मे दिसा, 'स्वास घेवपाच्या त्रासा' वांगडा तुजीं लक्षणां वाडलीं, आनी 29 मे दिसा, तुजी 'आर.टी.-पी.सी.आर.' (कोविड चांचणी) 'पॉझिटिव्ह' आयली.

question: Why was a mother put on a ventilator?
answer: 29 मे दिसा, तुजी कोविड-19 चांचणी पॉझिटिव्ह आयली तेन्ना, तुका 'एअरवे इंट्युबेशन अँड मेकॅनिकल व्हेंटिलेशन' हातूंत दाखल केलो आनी तुका 'श्वसन त्रासाचो' अणभव आयलो.

question: हांवें स्वास सोडलो. ताका 'न्युमोटरेक्स' म्हणटात.
answer: 06/04 दिसा दुयेंतीची तपासणी केल्या उपरांत, तुमच्या अहवालांत सांगलां: "स्थिती: दोनूय वटांनी न्युमोथोरॅक्स, कातीच्या सकयल आशिल्लो एम्फिसीमा तोंडा मेरेन पातळ्ळा." हाचो अर्थ दोनूय पुल्मांव कोसळ्ळ्यात, जाका लागून कातीच्या सकयल हवा एकठांय जाल्या.

question: म्हज्या तोंडाकल्यान रगत येता काय?
answer: सोबीत विधानांत "हृदयाच्या आंगांतलें रगतस्राव" आनी तुजी "पुराय अँटीकोआग्युलेशन" जाल्ली आसा अशें सांगलां.

question: हांवें हेर खंयचीय पिडा आशिल्ली काय, कोविड-19 भायर?
answer: श्वसनमार्गाच्या सोदांत 'यीस्ट संसर्ग' (कॅंडिडा अल्बिकन्स), 'मेकॅनिकल व्हेंटिलेशन इन्व्हॉल्व्हमेंट' आशिल्लो 'निमोनिया', दुबावीत 'कॅथेटर-संबंदीत रक्तांतलो संसर्ग' आनी 'स्यूडोमोनास एरुगिनोसा' हांचो आस्पाव आशिल्लो.

question: म्हजो दाळो इबाडला काय कितें?
answer: तुवें 18 जून दिसा मुत्रपिंड सुकें (दर्जा III) केल्लें. 20 जून दिसा तें परत इबाडलें, आनी तुका हिमोडायलिसिस करपाची गरज आसा.

question: हांवें रगत पातळ करपी वखद (नोक्सोपायरीन) बंद करचें?
answer: 20 जून दिसा ताका मुत्रपिंड निकामी जाल्ल्यान रगत निवळपाची गरज आशिल्ल्याचें कळ्ळें आनी 14 जून दिसा थ्रॉम्बोसीस जाल्ल्याचें कळ्ळें, ताका लागून एंडोकार्डियम इन्फार्क्शन जालो.

question: निमाणो निकाल कसो आशिल्लो?
answer: सुंदर पिचाई म्हणटा: "(अभिनेत्याच्या) मरणाक लागून देखाव्यांत एक फट पडली."

discharge_summary: 1. coronavirus infection onset of symptoms 02/17 orotracheal intubation 02/24 extubation 03/08 2. septic shock from pulmonary focus requiring vasoactive drug resolved: antibiotic therapy: ceftriaxone 02/23 03/02 clarithromycin 04/24 03/02 corticosteroid therapy: 02/24 03/09 3. critically ill polyneuropathy grade 2 strength upper limbs and lower limbs 4. pressure injury left lower limb grade i 5. your appointment scheduled with gynecology. on 03/24 for investigation. admission: 02/24/2020, discharge: 03/19/2020, stay: 22 d 21 h, location: ward, payer: sus. current: [person] with severe acute respiratory syndrome due to coronavirus, onset of symptoms on 02/17, requiring orotracheal intubation due to respiratory failure on 02/24, due to the possibility of associated bacterial pneumonia, antibiotic therapy with ceftriaxone and clarithromycin was performed. [person] presented satisfactory clinical evolution, and extubation was performed on 03/08, without complications. Gradual weaning of oxygen therapy was performed, and oxygen was withdrawn on 03/17, at the time comfortable in room air. Due to prolonged use of neuromuscular blocker to manage mechanical ventilation, [person] developed critically ill polyneuropathy, currently with grade II motor strength in the upper and lower limbs. He also has a pressure injury in the left lower limb, which is improving, with no signs of infection. Insulin therapy was started to manage hyperglycemia, with weaning after optimization of oral metformin. It is worth mentioning that during hospitalization [person] presented abnormal vaginal bleeding, and an appointment with gynecology was scheduled for 03/24 for investigation. Good general condition, hydrated, normal color, acyanotic, anicteric, afebrile; respiratory auscultation: vesicular breath sounds with crackles on a residual basis, without respiratory distress; cardiac auscultation: regular heart rhythm in two beats; normal sound sounds without murmurs; abdomen: innocent; extremities without edema, free calves, capillary refill time less than 3 s, ulcer on the left lower limb, grade I. therapeutic plan: I speak with [person] about the importance of performing pulmonary and motor physiotherapy to manage polyneuropathy in critically ill patients. He states that he will pay for home physiotherapy. He is referred to a basic health unit: management of hypertension and diabetes. Dressing of ulcer in the left lower limb region. I prescribe a dressing with AGE. Guidance from the nutrition team regarding the home diet. I follow-up appointment to the GEAD outpatient clinic on 04/26 for clinical reassessment. I follow-up appointment to the speech therapy outpatient clinic on 05/05. I schedule a pelvic ultrasound for 03/22 and a surgical gynecology outpatient clinic for 03/24. I investigate uterine bleeding. against reference [organization]. Good general condition, maintaining polyneuropathy in critically ill patients, with improvement in motor strength grade II.
question: कितें, म्हाका आतां हॉस्पिटलांत घालतात काय?
answer: ताका कोरोना वायरसान तीव्र स्वास घेवपाच्या त्रासाच्या सिंड्रोमा खातीर भरती केल्लो आनी 24/02/2020 दिसा इंट्युबेट करचो पडलो.

question: Are antibiotics like Enamox necessary?
answer: जावंक शकता अशें मानिल्ल्या बॅक्टेरियाच्या न्युमोनियाचेर सेफ्ट्रियाक्सोन आनी क्लॅरिथ्रोमायसीन वांगडा अँटिबायोटिक उपचार सुचोवंक मेळटा.

question: कित्याक म्हजो दांडो आनी पांय इतले अशक्त आसात?
answer: खूब तेंप स्वासोस्वास घेवपाखातीर न्युरोहोर्मोनल डिकम्पॅन्सेटर वापरल्या उपरांत, तो खोल, प्रगतीशील आनी जीवघेण्या पॅरालायटीक कोमा अवस्थेंत गेलो, जाचो परिणाम ताच्या वयल्या आनी सकयल्या अवयवांचेर जालो.

question: जेन्ना हांव तरणाटो जालों, तेन्ना हांवें कितें करचें?
answer: गंभीर पिडेस्तांक पॉलीन्युरोपॅथी जावची न्हय म्हूण फॉस्फोरोथेरपी आनी मोटर फिजिओथेरपी करपाची येवजण आसा. थोडक्यांत सांगचें जाल्यार, 'गुड्यांच्या फिजिओथेरपी खातीर पयशे जाय म्हूण तो म्हणटा' असो उल्लेख आसा.

question: हांव हॉस्पिटलांत गेल्लों काय?
answer: ताची मानसिक स्थिती 'खराब' आशिल्ली, ताका 'पक्षाघात', 'जकडणूक' आनी 'आघात' जाल्लो. परिवहन पंगडान ताका 60x00 mmHg रक्तदाब, असंतुलित ऑक्सिजन शुद्धीकरण... अशक्त हात आनी पांयां सयत ग्लासगो 6 सावन वाटावलो.

question: सॅप्टिक शॉक म्हणल्यार कितें?
answer: सोबीत स्पश्टीकरणान "सॅप्टिक शॉक ऍबडोमिनल फोकस" आनी "सॅप्टिक शॉक हेमेटोसिस" अशें सांगलां. लक्षणां मदीं "सामान्य अशक्तपण, पातळ परसाकडेन, उणी चेतना" आनी "हेमोडायनामिक अस्थिरताय" (उणो रक्तदाब) हांचो आस्पाव आशिल्लो, जाका लागून ताका "नॉरएड्रेनालाईन" (रक्तदाब वखद) घेवचें पडलें.

discharge_summary: abdominal septic shock, bloodstream septic shock. admission: 03/15/2020, discharge: 03/29/2020, stay: 14 days 02 hours, location: ward: payer: sus. 1 septic shock abdominal focus decline in general condition diarrhea decreased level of consciousness onset of symptoms 03/14 orotracheal intubation on admission 03/15 due to decreased level of consciousness antibiotic therapy: meropenem din 03/15 2 atrial fibrillation [person] with irregular rhythm on admission despite no record of the comorbidity in the medical record, {person} of [person] confirms previous diagnosis of atrial fibrillation, electrocardiogram admission 03/15: atrial fibrillation 3 septic shock bloodstream 03/22: worsening of hemodynamics worsening of parameters in blood culture tests 03/22/2020: klebsiella pneumoniae. presenting complaint: decreased level of consciousness, respiratory failure, diarrhea, chest pain, history collected from [person], [person] and [person]: [person] observed a decreased level of consciousness this morning, with [person] aphasic, and presenting worsening of the basal hemiplegia. She evolved with respiratory distress, and the [organization] was called to provide assistance. at the scene, the [organization] team found blood pressure of 60x0 mmhg, non-measurable oxygen saturation, capillary refill time greater than 3 s, poorly perfused extremities, glasgow 6. 1000 ml of ringer's lactate and 500 ml of sf 0.9% were infused during transport and oxygen was administered 10 l/min via mask with reservoir. Norepinephrine 20 ml/h was started while still in the ambulance shortly before being admitted to the {organization}. [person] reports that [person] has had a progressive decline in her general health and diarrhea since yesterday, with 4 voluminous, watery bowel movements, without blood or pus, after 5 days of constipation. [person] also reports that [person] complained of chest pain this morning, but was unable to detail the characteristics of the pain. They deny fever, abdominal pain, dyspnea, cough, dysuria, nausea, vomiting, or other symptoms. [person] was admitted to the lower emergency unit, glasgow 9 3 1 5, with evident respiratory distress, pulse oxygen saturation not measurable, poorly perfused, capillary refill time greater than 3 s. Orotracheal intubation was performed on admission, {omitted}. Sedation with fentanyl and midazolam was initiated. Norepinephrine was maintained at 25 ml/h 0.382 mcg/kg/min. personal history: 1 systemic arterial hypertension 2 epilepsy in AEPA follow-up 3 nucleocapsular hemorrhagic stroke ich1 / sich1 on 07/01 etiology: hypertensive, clinical: right hemiparesis, deviation of the labial rhyme to the left, confusion nihss admission 17 1b.2 / 4.2 / 5d.3 / 5e.1 / 6d.3 / 6e.2 / 8.1 / 9.1 / 10.2 previous rankin: 0 computed tomography of the skull admission: intraparenchymal thalamocapsular hemorrhage 7.7 ml CT Angiography (CTA): no stenosis or significant vascular changes identified during previous hospitalization 07/01, left hemothorax with atelectasis due to fractures of the ribs t6t11 trauma prior to hospitalization resolved with thoracic drainage fracture of the left transverse process of t7 and fractures due to demineralization from t6t11 continuous use medications: enalapril 10 mg 12/12h amlodipine 10 mg hydrochlorothiazide 25 mg carbamazepine 700 mg/day phenobarbital 100 mg/day propranolol 40 mg [person] brought, but does not know how to inform the dose, laboratory tests: 03/16 hb 12.5 ht 38 leuco 22,000 plt 282,000 na 129 k 4.6 ca 1.04 cr 1.4 lact 3.7 urine routine nitrite leuco 20,000 red blood cells 3540 granular casts 03/18: hb 11.2 ht 34 leuco 15300 plt 150000 na 134 k 3.3 cr 0.88 ur 82 lactate 2.4 pcr 23.75 ldh 821 cultures: blood culture 03/15: no growth. urine culture 03/15: no growth. tracheal aspirate 03/16: no growth. blood culture 03/22: klebsiella pneumoniae. antibiotics on admission meropenem 03/15 03/16 ceftriaxone metronidazole 03/16 03/21 meropenam vancomycin 03/22 03/27 ceftazidime avibactam 03/28 03/29 imaging tests: transthoracic echocardiogram 03/17: moderate dilation of the left atrium and mild dilation of the left atrium and ventricle. markedly depressed systolic performance of the ventricles. alterations in segmental mobility of the left ventricle. moderate mitral valve insufficiency. mild pulmonary valve insufficiency. in time, late in the afternoon, I am called to evaluate [person] in a semi-intensive bed. I find [person] monitored with orotracheal intubation and mechanical ventilation with the following vital signs on the monitor: heart rate: 0 beats per minute, no electrical activity identified by the monitor and no invasive blood pressure curve on the monitor. no signal also on pulse oximetry. I perform a physical examination with absent central pulses. I perform a physical examination with absent central pulses. I proceed with a physical examination of the trunk reflex with absence of oculocephalic reflexes, absence of corneal-palpal reflex and fixed medium pupils that do not react to light, without consensual reflex. I certify death at {omitted}. surgical tracheostomy 03/27. death.
question: म्हज्या भावाक कसलीय पिडा आसा काय?
answer: ताका 'क्लबिसेला न्युमोनिया' आनी 'कल्चर कल्चर 03/22' जालां अशें निदान जालें. हें 'सॅप्टिक शॉक हेमरेज' आनी 'हेमोडायनामिक अस्थिरताये'क लागून जाल्लें.

question: हृदयाचो तपासणी (इकोकार्डियोग्राम) कितें दाखयता?
answer: ट्रान्ससोफेझियल इकोकार्डियोग्राम (टी. सी. ई.) "लक्षणीयपणान उणो जाल्लो सिस्टोलिक इकोकार्डियॉग्रॅफिक काळजाचो वाठार", "अंशतः खंडीय गतिशीलतायेचें लुकसाण", आनी "सौम्य मायट्रल वाल्व अपुरेपणा" दाखयता.

question: आसा म्हाका नाकांत कसलोय त्रास?
answer: तुमी 'असामान्य धडधड' वेळार वांटो घेतिल्लो अणभव घेतलो. 'इलेक्ट्रोकार्डियोग्राम प्रवेश 03/15' हें 'एट्रियल फाइब्रिलेशन' न निदान केलें, जें तुमच्या कुटुंबांतल्या लोकांनी 'पयलींच आशिल्ल्या दुयेंसाची वळख' करून खात्री केलें.

question: म्हाका दाद जाली काय?
answer: ताच्या "सामान्य भलायकेक पिरायेक लागून जाल्ल्या सामान्य बदलांक लागून थोडो फरक पडला, आनी ताका पोटांत दुखप, चार फावटीं हागवण लागप, आनी सेप्टिक शॉक आनी पोटाच्या त्रासाक लागून पोटांत दुखप अशीं लक्षणां दिसतात" अशें संक्षिप्त अहवालांत सांगलां.

question: "सर्जिकल ट्रेकियोस्टोमी" (मानेच्या सकयल शीर दवरपाची प्रक्रिया) करपाचें कारण कितें आशिल्लें?

question: निमाणो निकाल कसो आशिल्लो?
answer: A doctor was called, and he saw the patient's 'heart rate': 0 beats per minute, no electrical activity was seen on the monitor. Physical examination revealed 'no central obstruction'... no reflective back, no reflective cornea, and the eye results were positive. In fact, it was said that 'I confirmed {death}'.

discharge_summary: 1. pneumonia, pulmonary metastasis? negative external rt pcr on 06/21 verified by surveillance on 06/23 2. syncope to be clarified neurocardiogenic? investigation suspended 3. consumptive syndrome due to duodenal papilla neoplasia. admission: 06/23/2020, discharge: 06/30/2020, stay: 07 d 05 h, location: ward, payer: sus. history of current illness admission: [person] referred from the emergency care unit, where he was hospitalized for 4 days. reports that 3 days ago he had a sudden episode of loss of consciousness, not preceded by prodromes, with follow-up appointment after a few seconds. level of consciousness without dysfunctions afterwards, without release of sphincters. reports only significant asthenia and fatigue associated. had 2 of these episodes on this day. had already had another similar syncope 20 days ago. He had several episodes of vomiting, which started 5 days ago and improved 2 days ago. His family called [organization] due to his condition. During the evaluation by the transport team, [person] reported an episode of fever (38.3 °C) and dry cough since 06/10. During hospitalization at [organization], he was given antibiotic therapy and referred [person] to our services. His syncope did not recur. He reported diarrhea for 15 days and improvement for 3 days, which is why his chemotherapy cycle was suspended. Upon admission, [person] was hemodynamically stable, breathing with a mask with a reservoir at 10 L/min, without respiratory distress, and denying any complaints at the moment. He is afebrile. Edema of the lower limbs, crackles, and reduced vesicular breath sounds on the left. [person] was pale and emaciated. No relevant results. Pleural fluid puncture and chest drain. Pneumonia, no pending tests. Antibiotic therapy: cefepime and clarithromycin. [person] evolves into death.

question: म्हाका अहवालांत सांगलां की म्हजो संसर्ग 'प्रतिरोधक' आशिल्लो. अँटीबायोटिक (मॉर्फिनॉल) कशें काम करता?
answer: सरस्वती म्हणटा, "जरी संस्कृतायेची व्याख्या 'लोकांच्या एका गटाक आशिल्ल्या मूल्यांची बेरीज' अशी केल्या, ह्या संदर्भांत, संस्कृतायेची व्याख्या रोगकारक हिमोफिलस न्यूमोनियान दाखयल्लो आचार म्हणून केल्या."

question: तुका ग्रीन लायट मेळपाक कसलीच अडचण आयली काय? आनी तुका ग्रीन लायट मेळपाची संवय लावपाची गरज आशिल्ली काय?
answer: तुमी हॉस्पिटलांत न्युमोनियाक लागून श्वास घेवपाक त्रास जाल्ल्यान आयिल्ले. तुमच्या दुसऱ्या तोंडाच्या रेडिओग्राफांत 25-30% फुफ्फुसाची अपारकता दिसली. ह्या गंभीर समस्येक लागून, तुमकां 12/13 ते 12/23 मेरेन एंडोट्रॅचियल इंट्यूबेशन (श्वास नळी) घालचें पडलें.

question: हांवें संसर्गाचेर उपचार केलां काय?
answer: तुका एश्चेरिचिया कोलाय पसून जाल्ल्या मुताच्या नळयेच्या संसर्गा खातीर सेप्ट्रियाक्सोन हें प्रतिजैविक दिलें. तुका हॉस्पिटलांत न्युमोनिया खातीर म्यर्पिनियम हें प्रतिजैविकय दिलें.

question: खंयच्या प्रकारची जतनाय घेवपाची गरज आसा?
answer: तुमकां तुमच्या रक्तदाबाच्या समस्ये खातीर घरगुती सेवा आनी घरगुती मोटर फिजिओथेरपी मेळटली. तुमकां 17 तारखेक परतून मुल्यांकन करपा खातीर फॉलो-अप अपॉइंटमेंट लेगीत आसा.

question: कितें, हांव वतना वखद घेवन वचूंक जाय?
answer: तुमी हॉस्पिटलांत आसतना वापरिल्लीं वखदां दवरपाचें येवजिलां. वळेरेंत लोसार्टन, सिर्ट्रोपिन, सिम्वास्टॅटीन, क्लोनाझेपॅम, व्हॅल्प्रोइक ऍसिड, फेनोबार्बिटल, आनी फेनोफायब्रेट कॉम्प्लेक्स हांचो आस्पाव जाता.

question: हांव हॉस्पिटलांत गेल्लों काय? खऱ्यांत म्हाकाच कांय त्रास जाला काय?
answer: "स्टेटस एपिलेप्टिकम डिकंप्रॅशन" अशें खरें कारण सांगलां. एस्पिरेशन न्युमोनिया वा हायपोग्लायसेमिया हांचोय उल्लेख शक्यताय म्हूण केला.

question: कितें इन्फेक्शन जालां म्हाका?
answer: तुका रक्ताच्या संक्रमणाचो इतिहास आशिल्लो. रगत कल्चर आनी तुज्या कॅटर टिप्स वयल्यान काडिल्ल्या कल्चरान कार्बिनमायसेस प्रतिरोधी क्लबिसीयल निमोनिया मेळ्ळो.

question: ताका खंयचोय रक्ताचो गट मेळ्ळा काय?
answer: ओह, सीटी एंजियोग्राफी दाखोवन फुफ्फुसांतलो थ्रोम्बोएम्बोलिझम 25% लोडांतल्यान तुमच्या काळजांत आनी मेंदवांत. तुमी अँटीकोआगुलंट उपचार निकोपेरीन सयत सुरू केलो.

question: मेंदूच्या स्कॅनान कितें दाखयलें?
answer: 10 मे दिसा केल्ल्या कवटेच्या संगणकीकृत टोमोग्राफींत खंयचीच संवसारीक दुबळेपण, पोस्टीरियरकॅलिपर, वा पोस्टीरियर कॉर्टिकल आनी सबकोर्टिकल हायपोएडेनोसीस दिसूंक ना.

question: म्हज्या ई.ई.जी. अहवालाचो अहवाल म्हाका दाखयलो काय?
answer: तुमचो इलेक्ट्रोएनसेफलोग्राम (EEG) चांचणी असामान्य आशिल्ली. निकाल 'मध्यम ते तीव्र विघटनशील अति सक्रियता' म्हूण नोंद केल्ले, आनी ते 'केंद्रीय मज्जासंस्थेच्या अवसादजन्य परिणामांक अनुरूप आशिल्ले'. तशेंच, 'मेंदूच्या आघाताक लागून जावपी दुयेंसांक न्हयकारूंक शकना' अशेंय नोंद केल्लें.

question: म्हाका ट्यूब घालपाची गरज कित्याक आशिल्ली?
answer: तुमी मेयाच्या ५ तारखेर फकत नळयेच्या आनी गुवाच्या दुयेंसाक लागून आयिल्ले. मेयाच्या १२ तारखेर तुमकां उणो रक्तदाब, हायपोक्सिया (उण्या ऑक्सिजन पातळेचें प्रमाण) आनी एंडोथोरॅसिक नळी (ई.टी.टी.) आशिल्लें.

rule out the effect of central nervous system depressant drugs. electroencephalogram 08/10: the marked symmetrical disorganization of the background activity due to diffuse and irregular slowing in the delta range, absence of physiological graphoelements of sleep and absence of electroencephalographic reactivity to painful stimuli noted intermittent modulation by low amplitude sinusoidal rhythms in the alpha/beta range. conclusion and electroclinical correlation: the electroencephalogram is abnormal. the findings are compatible with the effect of central nervous system depressant drugs, and associated encephalopathy cannot be ruled out.
question: कितें घेवचें हांवें मेंदवाच्या दुयेंसाचें वखद?
answer: तुमी नेमान घेतात ती वखदां म्हळ्यार 250mg व्हॅल्प्रोइक ऍसिड आनी रातची 2.5mg क्लोनाझेपॅम. तुमी पयलीं 2017 वर्सा क्लोनाझेपॅम घेतिल्लें, आनी हॉस्पिटलांत आसतना तुमचो लॅमोट्रिजिनचो डोस वाडयल्लो अशें तुमीच्या आदल्या नोंदींनी दिसता.

discharge_summary: admission: 12/06, discharge: 12/21, stay: 14 d 11 h, location: ward, payer: sus. 1. heart failure profile c dobutamine on 12/07 and 12/08, 2. abscess in the left thigh, osteomyelitis in the pubis, fournier's syndrome, drainage on 12/03 with ultrasound and drain placement on 12/15, treatment with ceftriaxone guided by culture of abscess escherichia coli multi s colonized antibiotic therapy after shock, incision in intensive care unit on 12/17 with abundant purulent secretion, {omitted}. 3. septic shock from cutaneous urinary focus on 12/16 polymyxin d0 12/15 amikacin and vancomycin on 12/17, 4. chronic kidney disease acute dialysis by fistula on 12/16 5. cardiorespiratory arrest with pulseless electrical activity, 10 minutes after intubation report of previous bradycardia, follow-up appointment after 1 minute of cardiopulmonary resuscitation, 6. vt with pulse after cardiorespiratory arrest, effective electrical cardioversion with a shock. question: म्हज्या इश्टाक हो संसर्ग कित्याक जालो?
answer: ताका दाव्या हातान गांठ आशिल्ली, आनी ताका हाडांची सूज आनी फ्रँकोनी सिंड्रोम आशिल्लो. गांठीच्या कल्चरान एसेरिशिया कोलाय मेळ्ळें. ताका लागून संशयीत सेप्टिक कात आनी मुताच्या नळयांचो संसर्ग जालो.

question: If not anything else, this much, right?
answer: तो अजापीत जालो आनी ताका श्वास घेवपाक त्रास जालो. पयलीं, नॉरपेनेफ्रिन दिल्यार ताका अस्वस्थ दिसलें, उपरांत ताका ब्रडी कार्डिया (हळू काळजाची धडधड) आनी व्हडलो धक्को बसलो. वखदां दिल्ल्यान लेगीत, ताका इस्केटीक हार्ट अटॅक आनी श्वास घेवपाक त्रास जावपी स्ट्रोक आयलो.

question: What limited treatment options were available to save his life?
answer: During the next hour, as he became more agitated, he was given norepinephrine.  When his condition worsened, he was given calcium gluconate, bicarbonate, and atropine, but nothing helped.

question: तुवें संसर्गा विशीं कितें केलें?
answer: वासराचें पोट रितें केलें, सुय सुल्लें, आनी भितरलें द्रव खर जंतुनाशकांत काडलें, जाका लागून खूब पूं आयलें. ताचेर सेफ्ट्रियाक्सोन, पॉलिमिक्सीन, एमिकासिन, आनी व्हॅन्कोमायसीन ह्या प्रतिजैविकांनी उपचार केलो.

answer: ताचें काळीज आनी स्वास थांबलो, आनी ताका "कार्डियाक अरेस्ट" जालो. मरणाचें कारण "ऍसिस्टोलिक कार्डियाक अरेस्ट आनी श्वसन अरेस्ट" आशिल्लें.

question: कितें, ताका हॉस्पिटलांत व्हेला काय? म्हाका कोरोना वायरस जाला काय?
answer: तुजी केंस गळप, काळजाची धडधड वाडप आनी ऑक्सिजन उणो जाल्ल्यान तुजी कूड अशक्त जाली, आनी तुका उपचारा खातीर दुसऱ्या हॉस्पिटलांत धाडले. पूण तुजी कोरोना वायरस पी.सी.आर. चांचणी न्हयकारात्मक आयली.
